  {
    "file_path": "h2q_project/test_quaternion.py",
    "content": "import unittest
import numpy as np
from h2q_project.quaternion import Quaternion

class TestQuaternion(unittest.TestCase):

    def test_creation(self):
        q = Quaternion(1, 2, 3, 4)
        self.assertEqual(q.w, 1)
        self.assertEqual(q.x, 2)
        self.assertEqual(q.y, 3)
        self.assertEqual(q.z, 4)

    def test_magnitude(self):
        q = Quaternion(1, 2, 2, 1)
        self.assertAlmostEqual(q.magnitude(), np.sqrt(10))

    def test_normalize(self):
        q = Quaternion(1, 2, 2, 1)
        q_normalized = q.normalize()
        self.assertAlmostEqual(q_normalized.magnitude(), 1.0)

    def test_conjugate(self):
        q = Quaternion(1, 2, 3, 4)
        q_conjugate = q.conjugate()
        self.assertEqual(q_conjugate.w, 1)
        self.assertEqual(q_conjugate.x, -2)
        self.assertEqual(q_conjugate.y, -3)
        self.assertEqual(q_conjugate.z, -4)

    def test_quaternion_multiplication(self):
        q1 = Quaternion(1, 2, 3, 4)
        q2 = Quaternion(5, 6, 7, 8)
        q_product = q1 * q2
        self.assertEqual(q_product.w, -60)
        self.assertEqual(q_product.x, 12)
        self.assertEqual(q_product.y, 30)
        self.assertEqual(q_product.z, 24)

    def test_rotation(self):
        # Rotate 90 degrees around the z-axis
        q = Quaternion.from_axis_angle(np.array([0, 0, 1]), np.pi / 2)
        v = np.array([1, 0, 0])
        v_rotated = q.rotate(v)
        self.assertAlmostEqual(v_rotated[0], 0.0, places=6)
        self.assertAlmostEqual(v_rotated[1], 1.0, places=6)
        self.assertAlmostEqual(v_rotated[2], 0.0, places=6)

        # Rotate 180 degrees around the x-axis
        q = Quaternion.from_axis_angle(np.array([1, 0, 0]), np.pi)
        v = np.array([0, 1, 0])
        v_rotated = q.rotate(v)
        self.assertAlmostEqual(v_rotated[0], 0.0, places=6)
        self.assertAlmostEqual(v_rotated[1], -1.0, places=6)
        self.assertAlmostEqual(v_rotated[2], 0.0, places=6)

        # Rotate 45 degrees around the y-axis
        q = Quaternion.from_axis_angle(np.array([0, 1, 0]), np.pi / 4)
        v = np.array([1, 0, 0])
        v_rotated = q.rotate(v)
        self.assertAlmostEqual(v_rotated[0], np.sqrt(2)/2, places=6)
        self.assertAlmostEqual(v_rotated[1], 0.0, places=6)
        self.assertAlmostEqual(v_rotated[2], -np.sqrt(2)/2, places=6)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    unittest.main()"
  }
]
